> Swapchain is an application for performing ACCS (atomic cross chain swaps) via HTLCs (hash-time-locked contracts).


[![FOSSA Status](https://app.fossa.io/api/projects/git%2Bgithub.com%2Fchronark%2Fswapchain.svg?type=large)](https://app.fossa.io/projects/git%2Bgithub.com%2Fchronark%2Fswapchain?ref=badge_large)
